components.bl

Class SoftLockController

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.bl.SoftLockController

  • public class SoftLockController
extends Object
    SoftLockController Class SoftLockController helps editing a record/value from two or more user at the same time

      • SoftLockController

        public SoftLockController(BBjString tableName$)
        Constructor Create a new SoftLockController object.
        Parameters:
        BBjString - tableName$: the tablename that should be locked.

    • Method Detail

      • onListNameSpace

        public void onListNameSpace(BBjNamespaceEvent ev!)
        Method onListNameSpace: event handler method, handles a NameSpaceChange callback. This method is called only from the SoftLockController on edit start or edit stop.
        Parameters:
        BBjNamespaceEvent - ev!: the event that causes this method call

      • setLock

        public BBjNumber setLock(BBjString keyValue$)
        Method setLock: set a lock for a field
        Parameters:
        BBjString - keyValue$: the fieldname (key) to be locked
        Returns:
        BBjNumber locked: true if lock was set successfull

      • isLocked

        public BBjNumber isLocked(BBjString keyValue$)
        Method isLocked: check if the given field (key) is locked
        Parameters:
        BBjString - keyValue$: the fieldname (key) to be checked if it is locked
        Returns:
        BBjNumber locked: true if the field (key) is locked

      • removeLock

        public void removeLock()
        Method removeLock: remove the lock if it is set

      • onRemoteEdit

        public void onRemoteEdit(BBjNamespaceEvent ev!)
        Method onRemoteEdit: event handler method, handles a remote edit callback.
        Parameters:
        BBjNamespaceEvent - ev!: the fieldname (key) to be checked if it is locked

      • broadcastEdit

        public void broadcastEdit(BBjString fieldName$,
BBjString value$)
        Method broadcastEdit: broadcasts a message that a softlock value has changed
        Parameters:
        BBjString - fieldName$: the field name that has changed
        BBjString - value$: the new (changed) value of the field

      • setCallbackForSoftlock

        public void setCallbackForSoftlock(BBjString labelOnLockStart$,
BBjString labelOnLockStop$)
        Method setCallbackForSoftlock: set the labels for handling the lock and unlock callback's
        Parameters:
        BBjString - labelOnLockStart$: the label that handles the "start lock" callback
        BBjString - labelOnLockStop$: the label that handles the "stop lock" callback

      • setCallbackForSoftlock

        public void setCallbackForSoftlock(CustomObject o!,
BBjString labelOnLockStart$,
BBjString labelOnLockStop$)
        Method setCallbackForSoftlock: set the labels or methods for handling the lock and unlock callback's
        Parameters:
        CustomObject - o!: the custom object containing the label's or method's for handling the lock and unlock callbacks
        BBjString - labelOnLockStart$: the label or method that handles the "start lock" callback
        BBjString - labelOnLockStop$: the label or method that handles the "stop lock" callback
